<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## throwError() function

`toError`の結果をスローします。

**Signature:**

```typescript
throwError: <T, E extends Error>(toError: (input: T) => E) =>
  (input: T) =>
    never;
```

## Example

```ts
const result: never = pipe(
  0,

  throwError((input) => Error(`input is ${input}`)),

  (input: never) => {
    // unreachable point
  },
);
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/throwError.ts)
